issue.message: The id "`btns`" is not defined anywhere.
issue.explanation: The `@+id/` syntax refers to an existing id, or creates a new one if it has not already been defined elsewhere. However, this means that if you have a typo in your reference, or if the referred view no longer exists, you do not get a warning since the id will be created on demand. This check catches errors where you have renamed an id without updating all of the references to it.

issue.message: Duplicate id `@+id/progressbar`, already defined earlier in this layout
issue.summary: Duplicate ids within a single layout
issue.explanation: Within a layout, id's should be unique since otherwise `findViewById()` can return an unexpected view.

issue.message: Duplicate id `@+id/textViewStatus`, already defined earlier in this layout
issue.summary: Duplicate ids within a single layout
issue.explanation: Within a layout, id's should be unique since otherwise `findViewById()` can return an unexpected view.
